short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Go to the next root comment on a Reddit thread.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension adds an arrow on the bottom left in a Reddit thread that allows you to jump to the next root (or parent) comment. 

This is useful when you find yourself scrolling long comment nests you don't want to read and you just want to read the next parent comment. Then you can just click the arrow.
